altemeldo, yes I will but let the DVDs come first..

So are you using Handbrake MKVGuy?
And if so, any special settings?

I use StaxRip, for HandBreak use targeted file size with 2-pass, audio Vorbis/AAC 2ch at 64kbps 48KHz and leave the rest of the settings as they are..
optionally you can increase the number of Reference Frame to 8 and B-Frames to 5, this will slow down the speed of encoding but a better quality can be achieved if your file size is less than 700mb for a 1.3hr or 2hr movie..
